'''''The Hidden Door: Songs in the Key of Enchantment''''' is the first music album by artist [[Ted Nasmith]]. It was released in [[2007]] with original art created by Nasmith for its cover art.<ref name="BandCamp">{{webcite|articleurl=https://tednasmith.bandcamp.com/album/the-hidden-door-songs-in-the-key-of-enchantment|articlename=The Hidden Door: Songs in the Key of Enchantment|dated=|website=[https://bandcamp.com Bandcamp]|accessed=6 February 2023}}</ref><ref name="HiddenDoorArt">{{webcite|articleurl=https://www.tednasmith.com/other/the-hidden-door/|articlename=The Hidden Door|dated=|website=[https://www.tednasmith.com Ted Nasmith]|accessed=7 February 2023}}</ref>
